title: Champion Stats
body: Can we get updated champion stats for next week? I am assuming this was a known issue and possibly even mentioned sometime during the broadcast, but all the statistics for ban-rate, pick-rate, etc. during champion select were from sometime in the 2014 summer split. Not very useful for the 2015 season.

replies.body: Well it seems kind of obvious they would use the 2014 stats. Why on the first week do you want to see the pick&ban rate of the champs of that first week that is playing? it will be almost all at 0 or 100%.

> [{quoted}](name=Xtractor,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=uNLu3L5k,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-27T07:48:14.485+0000)
>
> Well it seems kind of obvious they would use the 2014 stats. Why on the first week do you want to see the pick&ban rate of the champs of that first week that is playing? it will be almost all at 0 or 100%.

Because having inaccurate stats defeats the purpose of having the stats in the first place. If they want to use old stats they should at least not use incomplete stats that are many months old.

In the previous season they did not recycle old stats every time a new split began.

In an effort to be more like OGN (pre-LCK --- I HATE THIS MONIKER) Riot thought they should show stats like them as well.

Welcome to the future...where everything is a cheap imitation of what Korean eSports did first.
